mapper.select: SELECT T3.* FROM ( SELECT T1.OG_ID , T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.OG_CD , T1.OG_NM , T1.OG_NM || ' (' || T1.OG_CD || ')' AS OG_CD_NM , T1.HGR_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02', 'ALC') AND T1.OG_LEVL_DV_CD = '3' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND #{ogTpCd} = 'W02' AND T1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} AND T1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} UNION SELECT T2.OG_ID , T2.OG_TP_CD , T2.OG_CD , T2.OG_NM , T2.OG_NM || ' (' || T2.OG_CD || ')' AS OG_CD_NM , T2.HGR_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 WHERE T2.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T2.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') AND T2.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND #{ogTpCd} IN ('W03', 'W06') AND T2.OG_ID = #{ogId} ) T3 ORDER BY T3.OG_CD

SELECT T3.* FROM ( SELECT T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM , T1.PRTNR_KNM || ' (' || T1.PRTNR_NO || ')' AS PRTNR_NO_NM , T1.CNTR_DT , T1.CLTN_DT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 ON T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND (T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' OR T1.CLTN_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM')||'%') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID = #{ogId} UNION SELECT T1.OG_TP_CD , T1.PRTNR_NO , T1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_NM , T1.PRTNR_KNM || ' (' || T1.PRTNR_NO || ')' AS PRTNR_NO_NM , T1.CNTR_DT , T1.CLTN_DT FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') AND T1.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.OG_ID = #{ogId} ) T3 ORDER BY T3.PRTNR_NM, T3.PRTNR_NO

SELECT DECODE(t1.OG_TP_CD, t2.OG_TP_CD, DECODE(t1.OG_TP_CD,'W02' , DECODE(t1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID, t2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID, '311', '321') -- 매니저인 경우 동일지역단인 경우 311 아니면 321 , DECODE(t1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID, t2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID, '316', '321')) -- 엔지니어인 경우 동일센터인 경우 316 아니면 321 , '321') -- 조직유형코드가 다르면 외부이관: 321 AS ASN_TF_DV_CD -- 배정이관구분코드 FROM ( SELECT OG_TP_CD, DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID, DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID, DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND OG_ID = #{bfchIchrBrchOgId} AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} -- 조회년월 ) t1 , ( SELECT OG_TP_CD, DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID, DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID, DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND OG_ID = #{afchIchrBrchOgId} AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} -- 조회년월 ) t2
